column5: Has anyone tried the Lowrance Ice fishing portable accessory pack PPP-161 which allows the use of a regular sonar unit (I have na X102 and a 520C) for ice fishing? I realize that the X67C ice machine does it as well, but the portable kit seems to give me everything I need to convert it to the same type of unit.

I have this portable pack from Lowrance for 3 of my units. They work great and I have never had a problem. Just make sure you follow the battery charge times correctly and even charge the battery while not in use in the summer and you will be fine.
Do you use it for ice fishing?
Yes I have this kit which I take my electronics from my boat and use them ice fishing as well. I do this for the GPS points from softwater fishing.
